strategy: Imperial Knight armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field a army based on the Imperial Knights.

formations.name: Questoris Banner
formations.units: One Seneschal and three of the following knights in any combination

formations.name: Armiger Banner
formations.units: Four Knight Helverins or four Knight Warglaive.

sections.name: Cerastus Banner
sections.description: Up to one Cerasus Banner for each Questoris Banner.

formations.name: Cerasus Banner
formations.units: One Seneschal and three of the following knights in any combination

sections.name: Relic Lances
sections.description: Up to two Support Banner for each Core Banners.

formations.name: Acastus Reliquae
formations.units: One Seneschal and two of the following knights in any combination

sections.name: Adeptus Mechanicus Navy Formations
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Imperial Knight Support and Adeptus Mechanicus Navy Formations

upgrades.title: Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

options.description: Replace a Seneschal in the army with a Baron

items.name: Dominus Knights
items.description: Add up to one Knight Valiant or Knight Castellan to a Questoris Banner or a Cerasus Banner. Note: One Knight Valiant or Knight Castellan for every 1500 points.

items.name: Cerasus Banner Upgrades
items.description: Add up to two Knights from the Cerasus Banner list to a Cerasus Banner. Note: apply points as listed if not free.

items.name: Questoris Banner Upgrades
items.description: Add up to two Knights from the Questoris Banner list to a Questoris Banner. Note: apply points as listed if not free.
